title: Build browser-dialog.js - Dialog handling
description: Implement browser-dialog.js tool for alert/confirm/prompt handling. Uses CDP Page.javascriptDialogOpening event. Features: accept/dismiss dialogs, input text in prompts, check dialog status. Priority: MEDIUM - Unblocks tests with alerts/confirms.

title: Build browser-wait.js - Smart waiting capability
description: Implement browser-wait.js tool to eliminate race conditions. Supports waiting for: text content, selectors, URL changes, and custom eval conditions. Uses CDP polling with configurable timeouts. Replaces fixed sleep delays with smart waiting. Priority: HIGH - Eliminates race conditions.

title: Build browser-console.js - Structured console access
description: Implement browser-console.js tool for proper error tracking. Uses CDP Runtime.consoleAPICalled + Log.entryAdded to capture console messages with stack traces, timestamps, and source info. Supports filtering by type (errors/warnings/info). Priority: HIGH - Critical for debugging.

title: Build browser-pages.js - Page/tab management
description: Implement browser-pages.js tool for multi-page testing. Uses CDP Target.getTargets + Target.activateTarget. Features: list all pages, open new pages, switch between pages, close pages, get current page. Priority: MEDIUM - Enables multi-page workflows.

title: Build browser-snapshot.js - Structured page tree
description: Implement browser-snapshot.js tool for LLM-friendly page analysis. Uses CDP DOM.getDocument + Accessibility.getFullAXTree to generate structured text output. Supports text and JSON formats. Priority: VERY HIGH - 1000x token savings (5KB vs 5MB screenshots).

title: Build browser-viewport.js - Proper viewport control
description: Implement browser-viewport.js tool for reliable responsive testing. Uses CDP Emulation.setDeviceMetricsOverride. Features: set custom width/height, presets (mobile/tablet/desktop), device pixel ratio control. Priority: MEDIUM - Reliable responsive testing.

title: Build browser-performance.js - Performance metrics
description: Implement browser-performance.js tool for performance testing. Uses CDP Performance.getMetrics to capture: TTFB, DOM load time, page load time, rendering metrics, JS/CSS coverage. Priority: LOW - Nice to have for performance testing.

title: Create jomarchy-agent-tools standalone installer
description: Built standalone jomarchy-agent-tools repository with modular installer (5 component scripts), comprehensive 17KB README, project templates, and integration with jomarchy main installer. Follows Mario Zechner's 'prompts are code' philosophy. Provides 24 generic tools with massive token savings (32,425 tokens vs MCP servers).

title: Build browser-network.js - Network request monitoring
description: Implement browser-network.js tool for API testing and debugging. Uses CDP Network.enable + event listeners to track request lifecycle. Captures: URL, method, status, headers, body, timing, response data. Supports filtering (fetch/XHR, failed requests). Priority: HIGH - Essential for API testing.
